sources.title: George B. Thomas Video Gallery
sources.summary: George B. Thomas's official video gallery featuring content where visitors can see him in action or learn what he's thinking about HubSpot, AI, or other tech topics.
keyPoints: Central hub for George's video content
Covers HubSpot tutorials and insights
Features AI and technology discussions
Demonstrates his video marketing expertise in action

sources.title: HubSpot Sprocket Talk YouTube Channel
sources.summary: YouTube channel dedicated to HubSpot tutorials, updates, and interviews. George B. Thomas built this community and created countless educational videos covering HubSpot Marketing, Sales, and Services Hub tools.
keyPoints: Dedicated to HubSpot tutorials, updates, and interviews
Deep dives into HubSpot Marketing, Sales, and Services Hub tools
Helps users achieve more ROI with their HubSpot account
George created this community from the ground up
Approaching 500,000 views and 10,000 subscribers milestone
quotes: Been such an amazing adventure on YouTube creating HubSpot tutorials

sources.title: Sidekick Strategies Videos
sources.summary: Video content hub on Sidekick Strategies featuring George B. Thomas's tutorials and educational content about HubSpot and marketing strategies.
keyPoints: HubSpot traffic analytics tutorials
Marketing strategy videos
Part of George's business Sidekick Strategies

sources.title: The HubHeroes Podcast
sources.summary: Podcast hosted by George B. Thomas featuring Liz, Max, Devyn, and George exploring the universe of inbound and HubSpot. Available on Apple Podcasts and other platforms.
keyPoints: Mission to empower marketing, sales, and business leaders
Explores inbound and HubSpot strategies
Features veteran HubSpot pros with high-level insights
Makes complex concepts simple enough for beginners
Backstage pass to strategies that drive results
quotes: The HubHeroes Podcast's mission is to empower marketing, sales, and business leaders to explore the universe of inbound and HubSpot in a way that's never been done before

sources.title: Beyond Your Default Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas's personal development podcast co-hosted with Liz Moorehead, exploring self-belief, transformation, and living beyond default norms.
keyPoints: Addresses questions like feeling stuck or unfulfilled
Explores the Superhuman Framework cornerstones: Love, Purpose, Passion, and Persistence
Challenges listeners to live beyond their default
Available on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and iHeart Radio
quotes: Everyone keeps telling me I should be happy, but I'm not
I feel stuck
I have a calling, but where do I start?

sources.title: The Hubcast Podcast (271 Episodes)
sources.summary: George B. Thomas recorded 271 episodes of the Hubcast, an inbound marketing podcast focused on HubSpot. Marcus Sheridan encouraged George to start this podcast.
keyPoints: 271 total episodes recorded
Focused on HubSpot updates, tutorials, and inbound marketing
Co-hosted with Carina Duffy
Video component available on YouTube
Episodes ended with 'go out into the world and do some HAPPY HUBSPOTTING!'
quotes: Go out into the world and do some HAPPY HUBSPOTTING!

sources.title: How To Use Video Everywhere Online - Agents of Change Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses video as the easiest way to communicate on a human level in a digital world, covering 80% videos, email signature videos, and multi-channel distribution strategies.
keyPoints: Video is the easiest way to communicate on a human level digitally
80% Videos: Address most frequent sales questions in 2-minute videos
Email signature videos for sales representatives
Product/service pages should have dedicated video content
Multi-channel distribution: YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn
Recommended tools: Wistia, Vidyard, Ecamm Live, TubeBuddy
Advocates insourcing video creation over outsourcing
quotes: Video is the easiest way to communicate on a human level in a digital world
Video is the ultimate bridge between sales and marketing teams

sources.title: How To Get Started With Personalised Video For Business
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses the role of personalized videos in business sales, covering tools, getting started with introduction and onboarding videos, and overcoming camera fear.
keyPoints: Tools: Go Video, Wistia Soapbox, Loom, BombBomb make personalized video accessible
Consumers want to see micro-expressions to assess authenticity
Start with introduction videos for new sign-ups
Send personalized onboarding content thanking individuals by name
Appearing 'unscalable' is actually a competitive advantage
Business is fundamentally P2P (person-to-person), not B2B or B2C
quotes: Where you find the magic moments where you actually make the most revenue is when you focus on the things that feel that are unscalable
Business is fundamentally P2P (person-to-person), not B2B or B2C, when executed authentically

sources.title: Go Video or Go Home - Agency Management Institute Podcast
sources.summary: George B. Thomas shares comprehensive video marketing strategies including the '80% Videos' concept, bulk video creation 'rockfests', equipment recommendations, and workshop revenue models for agencies.
keyPoints: Created over 400 HubSpot video tutorials independently
80% of content consumed by prospects will be video-based
80% Videos: Quick revenue-driven videos answering frequent sales questions
Bulk creating in quarterly 'rockfests': 30-35 videos in a day and a half
Three Core Principles: Human, Happy, Helpful
Equipment ranges from $1,500 prosumer cameras to smartphones with BeastGrip
Recommended editing: DaVinci Resolve (free), Camtasia, Adobe Premiere
Workshop revenue model: $3,500-$7,500 communication training
70% of buyer's journey completes before direct contact
quotes: Video is the ultimate bridge between sales and marketing, and creating content
When you go to relationship, you go to trust. When you go to trust, you go to reciprocity. And when you go to reciprocity, that equals revenue
I'm not paralyzed by perfection because I'm focused on publication
Embrace the messy

sources.title: Webinar Example: Blending Webcam, Screenshare and More - Vidyard
sources.summary: George B. Thomas demonstrates how to create more engaging live webinars through thoughtful blending of webcam views, screen shares, and other production elements.
keyPoints: Demystifies the video creation process
Shows how to blend screenshares with webcam views
Makes webinars more engaging through production variety
Part of Vidyard's Visual Sale resources
quotes: Webinars become way more engaging when you're thoughtful about your approach to blending screenshares, webcam views, and more

sources.title: Vidyard Fast Forward 2020 - Video Tips for Virtual Selling
sources.summary: George B. Thomas speaks at Vidyard's Fast Forward virtual event, sharing tips on growing video confidence, choosing compelling topics, and improving production quality.
keyPoints: Grow confidence in videos you're making
Pin down video topics that capture viewers' attention
Use the right tools to up production quality
Keynoted Vidyard's virtual event three years in a row

sources.title: Creating More Effective Videos - Impulse Creative Webinar
sources.summary: 30-minute on-demand webinar by Impulse Creative featuring George B. Thomas on how to create more effective marketing and sales videos.
keyPoints: 30-minute on-demand format
Focuses on marketing and sales video creation
Practical tips for effective video content

sources.title: TwentyThree Marketing Expert Series - Video Marketing for Brands
sources.summary: George B. Thomas appears as Marketing Evangelist at Impulse Creative in the TwentyThree Marketing Expert Series, breaking down all-things video marketing for brands.
keyPoints: Part of TwentyThree Marketing Expert Series
Comprehensive video marketing guidance for brands
Presented as Marketing Evangelist at Impulse Creative

sources.title: INBOUND 2025 - The Secret to SuperHuman-Centric Marketing That Converts
sources.summary: George B. Thomas unveils the SuperHuman Marketing Framework at INBOUND 2025, presenting a blueprint for marketing that builds trust and converts through human-centric approaches.
keyPoints: Unveiling the SuperHuman Marketing Framework
Most marketing today is robotic, disconnected, forgettable
Humans don't buy from brands - they buy from other Humans
Blueprint for marketing that feels good, builds trust, and converts
quotes: Humans don't buy from brands. They buy from other Humans
Most marketing today is robotic, disconnected, forgettable

sources.title: INBOUND 2021 Speaker - Pillar Page and Content Cluster Strategy
sources.summary: George B. Thomas speaks at INBOUND 2021 on pillar page and content cluster strategy, teaching attendees how to create the right content around topics their business wants to be known for.
keyPoints: Pillar page and content cluster strategy session
Helps businesses create content around key topics
Part of ongoing INBOUND speaking since 2015

sources.title: Social Media Marketing World - Emcee and Speaker
sources.summary: George B. Thomas served as Emcee at Social Media Marketing World, introducing speakers for their presentations in front of thousands of attendees. He introduced speakers like Marcus Sheridan and Anne Handley.
keyPoints: Served as Emcee two years in a row
Introduced speakers including Marcus Sheridan and Anne Handley
Performed in front of thousands of attendees
Had a room of 700 people laughing, engaged, and energized
quotes: George is one of those rare individuals that connect with people at an amazingly intimate level
He gives the audience 100% of himself, whether it's an audience of 50 or 5,000

sources.title: Ecamm Live at Social Media Marketing World 2020
sources.summary: George B. Thomas was among special guests joining Ecamm at their Live Streaming Lounge booth at Social Media Marketing World 2020, alongside livestreaming experts like Luria Petrucci, Justin Brown, Brian Fanzo, and Stephanie Liu.
keyPoints: Featured guest at Ecamm Live Streaming Lounge
Participated in live video AMAs
Joined other livestreaming experts at the event
Demonstrated Ecamm Live capabilities

sources.title: Ask the Experts with George B. Thomas - Ecamm
sources.summary: Stephanie Liu interviews George B. Thomas about video marketing, live video, and Ecamm Live in this Ask the Experts video session.
keyPoints: Interview format with Stephanie Liu as host
Covers video marketing strategies
Discusses live video techniques
Ecamm Live platform demonstration
quotes: If you're not using video to grow your brand, you're already falling behind

sources.title: Marketing Smarts Live Show - World-Class Case Studies; Building Trust on the Internet
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses building trust on the internet through world-class case studies on the Marketing Smarts Live Show by MarketingProfs.
keyPoints: Building trust through online content
Case study analysis and best practices
Part of MarketingProfs video content

sources.title: Marketing Smarts Live Show - Three Pillars of Winning Communication
sources.summary: George B. Thomas shares the three pillars of winning communication - Value, Passion, and Connection - on the Marketing Smarts Live Show.
keyPoints: Three pillars: Value, Passion, and Connection
Framework for effective communication
Applicable to video and all marketing content

sources.title: HubnSpoke Podcast - Episode 50 with HubCast Star George B Thomas
sources.summary: George B. Thomas appears as a special guest on the HubnSpoke podcast discussing his move from Impact to Impulse, highlights of four years doing the HubCast, and how 19+ HubSpot certifications impacted his career.
keyPoints: Veteran of 172+ HubCast podcast episodes at time of interview
Discussed transition from Impact to Impulse Creative
A HubSpot expert that bleeds orange
Accredited HubSpot trainer consulting globally

sources.title: It Just Takes One Play - Podcast Episode 167
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses his journey and philosophy around taking action and making plays that change your trajectory in business and life.
keyPoints: Philosophy on taking decisive action
Personal journey and transformation
Mindset for business and personal growth

sources.title: AI Digital Clone: How to Augment Your Team's Expertise
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses building an AI Digital Clone of himself, trained on over 16 million words of his unique content, insights, core values and beliefs.
keyPoints: Built an AI Digital Clone trained on 16+ million words
Clone includes his content, insights, and core values
Demonstrates innovative use of AI in personal branding
Shows how to augment team expertise with AI

sources.title: Mick Unplugged - Digital Marketing Mastery and Life Lessons
sources.summary: George B. Thomas shares insights on digital marketing mastery and life lessons on the Mick Unplugged podcast.
keyPoints: Digital marketing expertise
Life lessons and personal philosophy
Career journey and insights

sources.title: The ChatGPT Experiment - Cloning Yourself with ChatGPT
sources.summary: George B. Thomas discusses the Superhuman Framework and how to clone yourself using ChatGPT, exploring AI applications for personal and professional development.
keyPoints: Superhuman Framework exploration
Using ChatGPT for self-cloning
AI applications in personal branding
Framework integration with technology

videoPhilosophy: Video is the easiest way to communicate on a human level in a digital world
Video is the ultimate bridge between sales and marketing teams
If you're not using video to grow your brand, you're already falling behind
70% of the buyer's journey is done before they ever pick up the phone
Video is the ultimate trust builder
Vulnerability and empathy are two leading components of video marketing

coreVideoFrameworks.name: 80% Videos
coreVideoFrameworks.description: Quick, revenue-driven videos answering the questions sales teams receive most frequently. 2-minute videos that provide efficient education instead of lengthy emails.

coreVideoFrameworks.name: Three Core Principles
coreVideoFrameworks.description: Every video should be Human (authentic), Happy (start with a smile), and Helpful (educate rather than sell)

coreVideoFrameworks.name: Rockfest Method
coreVideoFrameworks.description: Bulk creating videos in quarterly sessions, producing 30-35 finished videos in a day and a half

coreVideoFrameworks.name: Trust-Revenue Connection
coreVideoFrameworks.description: Relationship leads to trust, trust leads to reciprocity, reciprocity equals revenue

recommendedTools: Vidyard - Detailed analytics and branded player customization
Ecamm Live - Embedding pre-produced videos in Facebook Live
Adobe Premiere and After Effects - Professional workflow
videoTypes: Email signature videos (30 seconds to 1.5 minutes)

credentials.title: Video Jedi
credentials.experience: 25+ years of sales and marketing experience
speakingCredentials: Social Media Marketing World Emcee (2 years)
Spoken at events with thousands of attendees

When you go to relationship, you go to trust. When you go to trust, you go to reciprocity. And when you go to reciprocity, that equals revenue
